Key: Kotori... seems so busy today.

I wanted to ask her out on a date today, but
if she's all booked up, maybe I should refrain.
Translation:
Quería invitarla a salir hoy, pero si está ocupada,
quizá debería abstenerme.

Key:
I can check up on her in the meantime. I wonder
if Kotori is visiting Reine-san right now.
Translation:
Puedo ir a verla mientras tanto. Me pregunto si Kotori
está visitando a Reine-san ahora mismo.

Key: If I can't find her, then I'll give up.
Translation: Si no puedo encontrarla, entonces me rendiré.

Key: Kotori always seems so busy...

I wanted to ask her out on a date today, but
if she's all booked up, maybe I should refrain.
Translation:
Quería invitarla a salir hoy, pero si está ocupada,
quizá debería abstenerme.

Key:
I can check up on her in the meantime. If she
doesn't pick up, I'll leave it for now.
Translation:
Puedo comprobar cómo está mientras tanto.
Si no contesta, lo dejaré por ahora.

Key:
Is Kotori here? I don't hear anyone talking.
Anyone there?
Translation:
¿Está Kotori aquí? No oigo hablar a nadie.
¿Hay alguien ahí?

Key:
Oh, there's Kotori. Looks like she's deep in
thought or something. Maybe I shouldn't bother
her.
Translation:
Oh, ahí está Kotori. Parece que está sumida
en sus pensamientos o algo así.
Tal vez no debería molestarla.

Key: Hm...? Oh, Shido.
Y-Yo...

What is it? Did you have more business with
Reine?
Translation:
¿De qué se trata?
¿Tuviste más negocios con Reine?

Key: No. This time it was with you, but...
Translation: No. Esta vez fue contigo, pero...

Key: But what?

You seemed so busy. You don't have time
for a date, do you?
Translation:
Parecías muy ocupada. No tienes
tiempo para una cita, ¿verdad?

Key: R-Right. Sorry, it's just...
Oh. Don't worry about it.
I'll invite someone else today then.
Translation: Invitaré a alguien más hoy entonces.

Key: Later...
...Wait.
I'm going on a date with you.
Translation: Voy a tener una cita contigo.

Key: Huh? B-but I thought you were busy...
I told you I'm going!
I felt stuck anyways... I need a little break.
Translation:
De todas formas me sentía atascado…
Necesito un pequeño descanso.

Key: I-I see... Then let's go.
Okay, let's.

All right. Now that we're in town, where should
we go? Wanna grab a bite?
Translation:
De acuerdo. Ahora que estamos en la ciudad,
¿dónde deberíamos ir? ¿Quieres comer algo?

Key: ...Yeah.
Huh...? Kotori...?
Oh... huh? O-Oh yeah... Sorry, what is it?
Translation: Oh... ¿eh? O-Oh sí... Lo siento, ¿qué pasa?

Key: I was asking if you wanted to grab a bite.
Translation: Te preguntaba si querías comer algo.

Key: Right. I'll eat whatever you want to eat.
Translation: Sí, claro. Comeré lo que quieras comer.

Key: Aren't you craving anything?
Nothing in particular.
Then, how about that...?
That? You mean the taiyaki stall?
I'll buy some, so wait right here.
Translation: Voy a comprar un poco, así que espera aquí.

Key: Sure.
Sorry for the wait... H-Hey, Kotori?!
What's the matter?! Do you feel sick?
Don't shout. It'll give me a headache.
Translation: No grites. Me dará dolor de cabeza.

Key: Oh. S-Sorry, b-but...

Honestly, I feel sick. I want to lay down,
but...
Translation:
Sinceramente, me siento mal.
Quiero acostarme, pero...

Key: Sorry. Let me be for just a little longer.
Translation: Perdona. Déjame estar un poco más.

Key: Kotori...
I'm fine. I'm fine...

(Kotori... looks like a ghost. Is it a good idea
for me to let her be...?)
Translation:
(Kotori... parece un fantasma.
¿Es buena idea que la deje estar...?)

Key:
(If she says she's fine, then that's all that
matters. But, what if she's not...?)
Translation:
(Si dice que está bien, eso es lo que importa.
Pero, ¿y si no lo está...?)

Key: Ask her to take a rest.
Lend a hand.
Kotori, take it easy.

O-Okay. Sorry. We're on a date and this is
what happens.
Translation:
Vale. Lo siento. Estamos en una
cita y esto es lo que pasa.

Key: Don't worry about that. Your health comes first.
Translation: No te preocupes por eso. Tu salud es lo primero.

Key: Th-Thanks...
...How do you feel? A bit better?
Y-Yeah, kinda...
Cool. We should head home to let you rest.
Translation: Genial. Deberíamos ir a casa para dejarte descansar.

Key: ...Right.
Can you walk?
Somehow...
Then let's go home.
Okay... Sorry.
Translation: Vale... Lo siento. Lo siento. Lo siento.

Key: Hm? Did you say something?
Nothing. Don't worry about it.
O-Okay...
(I wonder if Kotori really is okay...)
Translation: (Me pregunto si Kotori realmente está bien...)

Key:
(Maybe Kotori's right. She'll feel better in
no time, but... what if she doesn't?)
Translation:
(Quizá Kotori tenga razón. Se sentirá
mejor en poco tiempo, pero... ¿y si no?)

Key: Sorry, Kotori.
Huh...? A-Aah!
Wh-What are you doing?! Let me down.
Sorry, I can't do that.
WHAT?! Wh-what did you just say?
You barely ever let it slip when you're sick.
Translation: Apenas se te escapa cuando estás enferma.

Key: I can't just let you live this way...
B-But I'm embarrassed...

Who cares about that? Health comes first.
If you're actually embarrassed, just bury
your face in my back so no one sees you.
Translation:
¿A quién le importa eso? La salud es lo primero.
Si de verdad te da vergüenza, entierra tu cara
en mi espalda para que nadie te vea.

Key:
If I can't help you at a time like this, what's
the point in me being your big brother?
Translation:
Si no puedo ayudarte en un momento así,
¿qué sentido tiene que sea tu hermano mayor?

Key: ...Shido.
...You're so dumb.
I know.
How much of a sister complex do you have?
You got a problem with that?
No, but...
Then, be still.
...Okay.

Hey, Kotori? If you're sick, you don't have to
answer, but...
Translation:
Oye, ¿Kotori? Si estás enferma,
no tienes que contestar, pero...

Key:
Do you remember doing this when we
were little?
Translation:
¿Recuerdas haber hecho esto
cuando éramos pequeños?

Key:
Remember when you fell in the park and
cut your knee?
Translation:
¿Recuerdas cuando te caíste en el parque
y te cortaste la rodilla?

Key:
Back then, I panicked because I let you
get hurt.
Translation:
En ese entonces, entré en pánico
porque dejé que te lastimaran.

Key: I need to get her to a doctor immediately!\nWhat if she needs surgery?!\n...I remember saying that.
Translation:
¡Necesito llevarla a un médico inmediatamente!
¿Y si necesita cirugía? Recuerdo haber dicho eso.

Key:
It was a just a scratch though, obviously...
Haha. Didn't stop me from panicking.
Translation:
Era sólo un rasguño, obviamente...  Jaja.
No me impidió entrar en pánico.

Key: Which means you haven't changed a bit since.
Translation:
Lo que significa que no has
cambiado nada desde entonces.

Key:
On the contrary, you've sure grown up.
But I hoped that I'd be grown by now too,
you know?
Translation:
Al contrario, sí que has crecido. Pero yo también
esperaba haber crecido ya, ¿sabes?

Key: You're fine just the way you are, Shido.
Translation: Estás bien tal y como eres, Shido.

Key: Oh, yeah? I sure hope that's true.
It is... I don't want you to change.
Translation: Es que… No quiero que cambies.

Key: Kotori...

Besides, I haven't changed as much as you
suggest.
Translation:
Además, no he cambiado
tanto como sugieres.

Key:
No, you've totally changed. Your mouth is
bigger, and you're meaner.
Translation:
No, has cambiado totalmente.
Tu boca es más grande, y eres más mala.

Key:
(Oops. I should say something good about
her.)
Translation: (Uy. Debería decir algo bueno de ella).

Key:
Oh, but uh... In a sense, you've gotten cuter
at least...
Translation:
Oh, pero eh... En cierto sentido,
te has vuelto más linda al menos...

Key: What?! Wh-What did you just say?
N-Nothing!
S-Say it again!
I refuse!
Jeez, you're such a coward.
Shut up!

Um, I guess you're right, but I still don't think
I've changed much.
Translation:
Supongo que tienes razón, pero sigo
pensando que no he cambiado mucho.

Key: Because... from that moment, I've...
...Kotori?
We're home, Kotori.
You can let me down now.
Really?
...Yeah.

Anyways Shido, I told you I didn't want to, but
you forced me to piggyback you in public.
Translation:
De todas formas Shido, te dije que no quería,
pero me obligaste a llevarte a caballito en público.

Key: W-Well, I was just desperate to help.
...I know that.

Um. Thanks, Shido. I felt safe with you carrying
me. Now, I feel so much better.
Translation:
Gracias, Shido. Me sentía segura contigo llevándome.
Ahora, me siento mucho mejor.

Key: O-Okay...
And... you have changed, though you can't tell.
Translation: Y... has cambiado, aunque no se note.

Key:
I never realized how much bigger your back
is. Hadn't noticed at all.
Translation:
No me había dado cuenta de lo grande que es
tu espalda. No me había dado cuenta en absoluto.

Key:
Oh, yeah. Well, my body's gone through some
changes since we were kids.
Translation:
Ah, sí. Bueno, mi cuerpo ha sufrido algunos
cambios desde que éramos niños.

Key: ...Want to go inside?
Okay.
